definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Some have had several children and are willing to have sterilization surgery.
sentences.chinese: 一些人有幾個孩子，並願意行絕育手術。

sentences.english: The oviduct inosculation operation was a primary method that oviduct was connected again after sterilization operation.
sentences.chinese: 輸卵管吻合術是絕育術後輸卵管再通的主要方法。

sentences.english: Removing the tumor and neutering the dog at the same time will help prevent recurrence.
sentences.chinese: 手術切除和絕育同時進行能有效防止復發。

sentences.english: However, early-age neutering requires special training of veterinarians.
sentences.chinese: 注意，操作早期絕育手術的需要經過特殊培訓。

sentences.english: In this case, it would help tremendously to have your male neutered.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，這將有助於大大有您的男性絕育。

sentences.english: In some cases the police simply rounded up poorpeople and hauled them to sterilization camps.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，警察會直接集合窮人，拉他們去絕育營。

sentences.english: She pays for neutering and food from her pension and donations.
sentences.chinese: 她支付，絕育及食物從她的退休金和捐贈。

sentences.english: More than a third of married women there have opted to be sterilized.
sentences.chinese: 就算是一再選擇再婚的女性也有權利選擇絕育。

sentences.english: However, 95 percent of perianal gland adenomas will disappear after neutering the dog.
sentences.chinese: 然而95%的肛周腺腺瘤在絕育後會自發消退。

sentences.english: She's been sterilized after she had five children.
sentences.chinese: 他們有了第五個孩子之後，她做了絕育手術。

sentences.english: For men vasectomy is the only option for sterilization.
sentences.chinese: 對於男性來講，輸精管結紮術是唯一的絕育手術。

sentences.english: And of course, if neutered, you will not have to worry about them "breeding like rabbits."
sentences.chinese: 當然，如果絕育了，你就不用擔心兔子的高繁殖率。

sentences.english: Neutering also can help reduce some behavioral problems.
sentences.chinese: 絕育同時也可以減少狗狗的一些行爲問題。

sentences.english: Early-age neutering may be done as early as 2 months of age.
sentences.chinese: 早期雄性絕育可以最早在2月齡進行。

sentences.english: The question of compulsory sterilisation has been the subject of lively public debate over the last few months.
sentences.chinese: 強制絕育是過去幾個月裏公衆熱議的話題。

sentences.english: On the other hand, spaying and neutering are not completely without possible negatives.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，噴施和絕育並非完全沒有可能的否定。

definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
to take in and care for (an elderly person, a dog etc)/to adopt (a child)/adoption
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
